pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Implements ProposerSlashing validator for validating slashings that we receive over the wire.
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

nodes.bodyText: nit: Probably worth extracting these into a utils class since we're duplicating them in a few places now.
That's quite the package name... Would just validators do?
Validating proposer slashing, but message says "Exit".
Not an exit.  This strongly suggests we could extract some common code to reduce duplication between these validators.
Maybe a follow up PR though.
